data.name: Schwarzerblitz - Ultra Fight Da ! Kyanta 2 Collaboration Costumes
data.detailed_description:
Schwarzerblitz meets Kyanta!

Taste a slice of craziness with this official costume collaboration with Ultra Fight Da ! Kyanta 2! Unleash your GUN with Azuma Wally and fight your way to the top with Kyanta Tiger, thanks to these stylish costumes - black outline included!

Important Note

To use the Azuma DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Wally Alba by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with Mono Kishima OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • clearing the story episode "End of the Beginning" OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.

Taste a slice of craziness with this official costume collaboration with Ultra Fight Da ! Kyanta 2! Unleash your GUN with Azuma Wally and fight your way to the top with Kyanta Tiger, thanks to these stylish costumes - black outline included!

data.short_description: Wally and Tiger get ready to fight, in these crazy "Ultra Fight Da ! Kyanta 2" official collaboration costumes! Unleash your GUN with Azuma Wally and keep your opponent at bay with Kyanta Tiger!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This DLC pack requires around 7MB of disk space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 740M
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
